amendment.description: Amendment requires the Committee for the Cumulative Analysis of Regulations that Impact Energy and Manufacturing in the United States to include the health effects associated with regulatory costs in its assessment.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 112-680 to require the Committee for the Cumulative Analysis of Regulations that Impact Energy and Manufacturing in the United States to include the health effects associated with regulatory costs in its assessment.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Benishek amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
